job.description: ltstronggtEmployee Applicant Privacy NoticeltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltstronggtltugtWho We AreltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtWelcoming collaborative and having the opportunity to make an inspired goals Galileo leads its industry with superior fraud detection security decisionmaking analytics and regulatory compliance functionality combined with customized responsive and flexible programs to accelerate the success of all payments companies and solve tomorrows payments challenges today We hire energetic and creative employees while providing them the opportunity to excel in their careers and make a difference for our clients Learn more about us and why we work here at httpswwwgalileoftcomworkingatgalileoltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtThe roleltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtWe are looking squashing bugs testing and deploying monitoring and supporting mission critical systems working on hyper scale modern payment technology and continually growing as an engineer Youll face and solve a wide range of challenges technical product domain and operational shaping your personal growth and career along the wayltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtWhat Youll DoltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligtBe an technologiesltligtltligtCommunicate and collaborate with project leads product managers and other software developersltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtltugtWhat Youll NeedltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligtBachelors Degree in Computer Science or related fieldltligtltligt1 years of experience or demonstrable equivalent including school projects or
